full_description:
JVCO J9TS 32 Inch HD Android Voice Control Smart LED Television

JVCO J9TS 32 Inch Smart TV comes with google Assistant & One Remote Control. The sleek One Remote Control keeps it simple and lets you quickly search all your favorite content from your set-top box to game consoles, apps, and even live TV. It runs with the Android 10 operating system and contains 2GB of RAM and 16GB of storage. You can watch videos or play games on this television via screen sharing from your smartphone, tablet, and another similar gadget. Users can utilize Facebook, Messenger, YouTube, and other social networking apps.
